code: import{LOAD_CART,ADD_PRODUCT,REMOVE_PRODUCT,CHANGE_PRODUCT_QUANTITY,CLEAR_CART}from'./actionTypes';export var loadCart=function loadCart(products){return{type:LOAD_CART,payload:products};};export var addProduct=function addProduct(product){return{type:ADD_PRODUCT,payload:product};};export var removeProduct=function removeProduct(product){return{type:REMOVE_PRODUCT,payload:product};};export var changeProductQuantity=function changeProductQuantity(product){return{type:CHANGE_PRODUCT_QUANTITY,payload:product};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:CLEAR_CART,payload:{}});};};
